Package com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.mobilegateway.listener

Interface MGDigitizationListener

public interface MGDigitizationListener
Listener for the digitize card events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void onActivationRequired​(PendingCardActivation pendingCardActivation)
    [Optional] After the selection of the IDV method, the end-user will receive an OTP according to the method chosen.
    void onComplete​(java.lang.String digitalCardId)
    This is the last and final method called by the MG SDK signaling the end of card enrollment process.
    void onCPSActivationCodeAcquired​(java.lang.String digitalCardId, byte[] activationCode)
    The MG server may give the activation code necessary to enroll the digitized card to CPS SDK for card installation.
    void onError​(java.lang.String digitalCardId, MobileGatewayError error)
    In case of error, this method will be called.

  • Method Details

    • onCPSActivationCodeAcquired

      void onCPSActivationCodeAcquired​(java.lang.String digitalCardId, byte[] activationCode)
      The MG server may give the activation code necessary to enroll the digitized card to CPS SDK for card installation. As soon as this method is called, MPA shall send the information to the CPS SDK to initiate the enrollment process immediately.
      Parameters:
      digitalCardId - the unique digital card id of the card.
      Digitized card ID shared by the HCE platform components (Different than token ID)
      activationCode - the activation code obtained from the digitize card request. For security purpose, MPA shall securely wipe the activation code after usage.

    • onSelectIDVMethod

      void onSelectIDVMethod​(IDVMethodSelector idvMethodSelector)
      This method will be called to ask the end-user to select from the list of IDV methods (e.g. Email, SMS).
      Parameters:
      idvMethodSelector - provides the list of IDV methods for selection.

    • onActivationRequired

      void onActivationRequired​(PendingCardActivation pendingCardActivation)
      [Optional] After the selection of the IDV method, the end-user will receive an OTP according to the method chosen. This will then be needed by the MG SDK to continue the flow and to activate the card. However, this callback is optional depending on the chosen IDV method.
      Parameters:
      pendingCardActivation - the pending card to be activated

    • onComplete

      void onComplete​(java.lang.String digitalCardId)
      This is the last and final method called by the MG SDK signaling the end of card enrollment process.
      Parameters:
      digitalCardId - the unique digital card id of the card.
      Digitized card ID shared by the HCE platform components (Different than token ID)

    • onError

      void onError​(java.lang.String digitalCardId, MobileGatewayError error)
      In case of error, this method will be called.
      Parameters:
      digitalCardId - the unique digital card id of the card
      Digitized card ID shared by the HCE platform components (Different than token ID)
      error - the error returned while performing card digitization
